com.flowpowered.noise.module.modifier

Class Range

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.noise.module.Module
      • com.flowpowered.noise.module.modifier.Range

  • public class Range
extends Module
    A modifier module to map a value from one range to another. For example: 0.5 (-1 < x < 1) -> 0.75 (0 < x < 1)
